sentences.sContent: A sermon, especially one intended to edify a congregation on a practical matter and not intended to be a theological discourse.
sentences.sContent_eng: A sermon, especially one intended to edify a congregation on a practical matter and not intended to be a theological discourse.
sentences.sCn: 布道一次讲道，尤其是旨在于实际问题上启发会众，而不在于成为神学讲演。

remMethod.val: 他编 (edit) 了本可以启发 (edify) 思维的书 → 启发

trans.tranOther: to improve the morality, intellect, etc, of, esp by instruction
